title: onko
author: onko
content: Connext Network, a blockchain protocol attempting to enable the development of applications that can access multiple networks, has closed a $7.5m strategic fundraising round on a $250m valuation from Polychain Capital, NGC Ventures, Polygon Ventures and other investors. - https://twitter.com/ConnextNetwork/status/1669007377314762752?s=20- https://twitter.com/CoinDesk/status/1668981910066929668?s=20

comments.author: onko
comments.body: They rebranded as Everclear.https://x.com/EverclearOrg/status/1836391877580669126Also their ticker changed to $NEXT --> $CLEAR. If you have NEXT you can change it for free.Details: https://x.com/EverclearOrg/status/1863991620502482980
